Package com.interface21.ejb.support

Superclasses to make implementing EJBs simpler and less error-prone.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
AbstractEnterpriseBean Superclass for all EJBs.
AbstractJmsMessageDrivenBean Convenient superclass for JMS MDBs.
AbstractMessageDrivenBean Convenient superclass for MDBs.
AbstractSessionBean Convenient superclass for session beans.
AbstractStatelessSessionBean Convenient superclass for stateless session beans (SLSBs), minimizing the work involved in implementing an SLSB and preventing common errors.
EJBContainerDetective NOTE: THIS CLASS IS A DEMONSTRATION ONLY: IT DOES NOT FORM PART OF THE FRAMEWORK PROPER.
JndiEnvironmentBeanFactory BeanFactory implementation populated by JNDI environment variables available to an object running in a J2EE application server.
 

Package com.interface21.ejb.support Description

Superclasses to make implementing EJBs simpler and less error-prone. The classes in this package are discussed in Chapter 11 of Expert One-On-One J2EE Design and Development by Rod Johnson (Wrox, 2002).
